title: The Blue Knight by Joseph Wambaugh (Epub) {Rose88}
description:
Title: The Blue Knight
Author: Joseph Wambaugh
Published: April 2008
Publisher: Grand Central Publishing
ISBN: 978-0-446-53637-0
Format: Epub (Retail)
Language: English
Genres: Fiction, Crime

Joe Wambaugh was big and brash in the real world. His beat was the underbelly of Los Angeles vice--full of pimps, pushers, winos, whores and killers. He lived each day his way--on the razor's edge of life. He was a damn good cop and LAPD detective. For fifteen years he prowled the streets, solved murders, took his lumps. Then, he became the hard hitting, tough talking best selling writer who tells the brutal, true stories of the men who risk their loves every time a siren screams. THE BLUE KNIGHT is a classic novel that offers the best of Wambaugh: a gritty setting, acerbic humor, and plenty of flawed but lovable characters.
